name: storytel-player
description: Storytel Unofficial Player - Storytel audiobook player for desktop

scripts.server: cd server && npm install && npm start
scripts.client: cd client && npm install && npm start
scripts.server:dev: cd server && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.electron:dist: npm run build && npm run server:build && npm run electron:build && electron-builder
scripts.preelectron:pack: npm run build && npm run server:build && npm run electron:build
scripts.preelectron: npm run build && npm run server:build
scripts.preelectron:dist: npm run build && npm run server:build && npm run electron:build
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist; rm -rf server/dist; rm -rf client/build

author: debba <andrea@debbaweb.it>
